property_details: FALL 2019 Sign a standard 12-month lease (August 17th, 2019 - August 01st, 2020) by May 31st and receive: AUGUST RENT FREE Reduced Application Fee ($10) Offering limited 9-month lease term options (additional $165.00 short-term premium fee added to monthly installment) There is a one-time non-refundable Lease Protect Fee that ranges from $88 - $500 based on your, or your guarantor's, credit score. We do not require a security deposit; the Lease Protect fee is our alternative. BUT for a limited time only, all approved applications will only need to pay a Lease Protect Fee of $88 (for 12 month leases starting August 17th, 2019 only)!!
